generic:link.msg:message: All the cells are mandatory and the value should be greater than or equal to 0.
Identity " Cumulative value of Total ( Total = Spot cash ready TT + Forwards + Cancellation of forwards ) " do not tally
Identity " Cumulative value of Total ( Total = Sum of child elements) " do not tally
Identity " Cumulative value of Total ( Total = Spot + Swaps + Forwards) " do not tally
